item.description:
An event for Minilympic teams only. Please do not RSVP unless you are registered in the Minilympics roster.

This event will be an elimination style tournament. Each round, player(s) with the lowest score will be eliminated until we have a winner or winners.

This event is worth 30 points for 1st place and 15 points for 2nd place. All teams will receive 5 points for participating.
.

 

The Game: The people have spoken.  Dominion received the most votes in the Player's Choice poll.

It should come to no surprise that this game received the most votes.  Dominion took this group by storm in 2010 and has kept no prisoners; we even feature regular game nights focusing purely on this game.  An excellent choice for a closing competition, no matter how familiar you are with the game or how skilled, it is almost impossible to guarantee victory.  Tonight you will hopefully see the best of the best compete in a game that encompasses many excellent gameplay elements of modern board game design and the pure, unadulterated fun and excitement that makes this group what it is.

Tournament will run from 6pm to 10pm for 8 players.  If you wish to participate as a spectator, please say so in the comments and we will have room on a first come, first serve basis for 8 people.

 

*** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** ***
Did you know? (A Tribute to Gaming around the World):

Greece, the nation that gave us the Olympics, is also believed to have modernized and popularized the pieces instrumental to many board games: the six-sided die.  As you can see, the Minilympic Logo pays tribute to this.
*** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** ***

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Minilympics: Player's Choice: Dominion
